definition: official records/grade (of goods)/file/records/shelves/slot/gap/crosspiece/classifier for crosspieces/classifier for events, affairs etc/Taiwan pr. [dang3]

pinyin: Wen2 dang4 Dui4 xiang4 Mo2 xing2

sentences.english: We have several word letters that uses a series of forms to input into the doc.
sentences.chinese: 我們有幾個字母詞使用到文檔形式輸入一個系列。

sentences.english: This makes writing document-processing applications much simpler.
sentences.chinese: 這樣使得文檔處理應用程序的編寫更爲簡單。

sentences.english: This leaves time in each task for the manual delivery of the paper.
sentences.chinese: 這爲每個任務留下了手工交付書面文檔的時間。

sentences.english: High-level security policies are documents in manual or digital format.
sentences.chinese: 高級安全策略是硬拷貝或數字格式的文檔。

sentences.english: I'll refer you to the documentation on how that works.
sentences.chinese: 我會指點您去查閱關於如何做這件事的文檔。

sentences.english: There are two ways in structuring handwritten documents, off-line and on-line.
sentences.chinese: 目前關於手寫文檔的結構化，分爲聯機和脫機兩種。

sentences.english: You can also specify addendum terms or documentation.
sentences.chinese: 您還可以指定附錄條款或文檔。

sentences.english: E-files of the application book shall also be provided.
sentences.chinese: 申報書應提供電子文檔。

sentences.english: Read the documentation or manual that your company provides.
sentences.chinese: 親自讀讀你公司提供的文檔或是手冊。

sentences.english: If you choose to validate documents, you typically validate at insert time.
sentences.chinese: 如果選擇驗證文檔，那麼通常是在插入時進行驗證。

sentences.english: Type the text that appears as a hyperlink in your document.
sentences.chinese: 鍵入在文檔中作爲超級鏈接顯示的文本。

sentences.english: Whenever it recognizes something in the document, it generates an event.
sentences.chinese: 每當它識別出文檔中的某些內容，就會生成一個事件。

sentences.english: Specifies support for storing database or recordset objects in documents and views.
sentences.chinese: 指定支持在文檔和視圖中存儲數據庫或記錄集對象。

sentences.english: The setup here is very similar to the parsing of the main document.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的設置與主文檔的語法分析十分相似。

sentences.english: KERSH puts his glasses back on and returns to his papers.
sentences.chinese: 克什把眼鏡又帶上繼續處理它的文檔。

sentences.english: Then document what works based on the positive results you achieve.
sentences.chinese: 工作的文檔應該基於您達到的正面的結果。

definition: to stick/to affix/to adhere/to paste (as in "copy and paste")/Taiwan pr. [nian2 tie1]/also written 黏貼|黏贴[nian2 tie1]
to file/to save a file (computer)/saved data (for a video game etc)
to file away/to place on file
to consult/to refer to/to look sth up in a reference source
